transArray.content: The location is very good, just near the Sanyuanqiao subway station. It's also very convenient to take a taxi to the customer's side, but the office building opposite the hotel room is too uncomfortable. If you don't draw the curtains, you always feel that you have no privacy. When you draw the curtains, it feels like a closed space. But this location and the price are not too demanding, overall it is good
